tasks.title: Set Up Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project environment with necessary tools and frameworks.
tasks.details: Use Next.js 14 with App Router for the frontend. Set up Tailwind CSS for styling and Zustand for state management. Initialize a PostgreSQL database with TimescaleDB extension for time-series data. Configure Redis for caching and BullMQ for queuing.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the environment setup by running a sample Next.js application and checking database connectivity.

subtasks.title: Set Up Next.js 14 with App Router
subtasks.description: Initialize the Next.js 14 project with App Router.
subtasks.details: Create a new Next.js 14 project and configure the App Router for navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run a sample Next.js application to verify setup.

subtasks.title: Integrate Tailwind CSS for Styling
subtasks.description: Add Tailwind CSS to the Next.js project for styling.
subtasks.details: Install Tailwind CSS and configure it with Next.js for styling components.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check if Tailwind styles are applied correctly to components.

subtasks.title: Configure Zustand for State Management
subtasks.description: Set up Zustand for managing global state in the application.
subtasks.details: Install Zustand and create a basic state management setup for the Next.js app.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify state updates and retrieval using Zustand.

subtasks.title: Initialize PostgreSQL with TimescaleDB
subtasks.description: Set up a PostgreSQL database with TimescaleDB extension.
subtasks.details: Install PostgreSQL and TimescaleDB, then configure the database for time-series data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Connect to the database and verify TimescaleDB extension is active.

subtasks.title: Configure Redis and BullMQ for Caching and Queuing
subtasks.description: Set up Redis for caching and BullMQ for task queuing.
subtasks.details: Install Redis and BullMQ, then configure them for caching and queuing tasks in the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Redis caching and BullMQ queuing with sample tasks.

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Data Ingestion
tasks.description: Develop a service to ingest data from various sources into TimescaleDB.
tasks.details: Create a service using Node.js to poll data from the Rails API for session, customer, tutor, and booking data. Use webhooks for real-time updates where possible. Transform and validate data before storing it in TimescaleDB.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate data ingestion with test data and verify data integrity in TimescaleDB.

tasks.title: Develop Real-Time Marketplace Health Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a dashboard to display real-time marketplace health metrics.
tasks.details: Use React and Recharts to build a dashboard displaying active sessions, daily session volume, average session rating, tutor utilization rate, customer satisfaction score, and supply/demand balance. Implement auto-refresh every 30 seconds.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard responsiveness and accuracy of displayed metrics with sample data.

tasks.title: Implement Customer Health Scoring System
tasks.description: Develop a system to calculate and display customer health scores.
tasks.details: Calculate risk scores based on first session success rate, session velocity, IB call frequency, goal completion status, and tutor consistency. Display sortable customer lists with drill-down capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate risk score calculations with test scenarios and ensure alerts trigger correctly.

subtasks.title: Calculate First Session Success Rate
subtasks.description: Develop the logic to calculate customer health scores based on the first session success rate.
subtasks.details: Implement an algorithm to analyze the success rate of the first session for each customer. Integrate this metric into the overall health score calculation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create test cases to validate the accuracy of success rate calculations.

subtasks.title: Analyze Session Velocity
subtasks.description: Create a system to evaluate session velocity as part of customer health scoring.
subtasks.details: Develop a method to measure the frequency and speed of customer sessions. Incorporate this data into the health score.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test session velocity calculations with historical session data.

subtasks.title: Evaluate IB Call Frequency
subtasks.description: Implement a metric to assess the frequency of inbound calls for customer health scoring.
subtasks.details: Design a process to track and analyze the frequency of inbound calls. Use this information to influence the health score.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate call frequency scenarios to ensure accurate data integration.

subtasks.title: Assess Goal Completion and Tutor Consistency
subtasks.description: Develop metrics for goal completion status and tutor consistency in health scoring.
subtasks.details: Create algorithms to evaluate how often customers meet their goals and the consistency of tutor interactions. Integrate these metrics into the health score.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate goal completion and tutor consistency metrics with sample data.

tasks.title: Create First Session Success Tracking
tasks.description: Track and display first session success rates by tutor and subject.
tasks.details: Develop a dashboard to show success rates by tutor, subject, and customer segment. Implement alerts for anomalies such as significant drops in success rates.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify accuracy of success rate calculations and alert triggers with historical data.

tasks.title: Develop Session Velocity Monitoring
tasks.description: Monitor session velocity and trigger alerts for at-risk customers.
tasks.details: Track sessions per week by cohort and alert for low velocity. Visualize cohort retention curves and session frequency trends.
tasks.testStrategy: Test velocity calculations and alert triggers with simulated data.

tasks.title: Build Supply vs. Demand Prediction Model
tasks.description: Create a model to predict supply and demand imbalances.
tasks.details: Use ARIMA or Prophet for time-series forecasting. Predict session volume by hour and track tutor availability. Generate alerts for imbalances.
tasks.testStrategy: Evaluate model accuracy with historical data and adjust parameters for optimal performance.

tasks.title: Implement Automated Campaign Recommendations
tasks.description: Develop a recommendation engine for recruiting campaign adjustments.
tasks.details: Create rule-based logic to suggest budget changes and campaign priorities based on supply-demand data. Display recommendations in a card-based format.
tasks.testStrategy: Test recommendation logic with various supply-demand scenarios and verify expected outcomes.

subtasks.title: Develop Rule-Based Logic for Recommendations
subtasks.description: Create the logic to suggest budget changes and campaign priorities.
subtasks.details: Design and implement rule-based logic using supply-demand data to generate recommendations for campaign adjustments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test logic with various data scenarios to ensure accuracy.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Supply-Demand Data Sources
subtasks.description: Connect the recommendation engine to existing supply-demand data.
subtasks.details: Establish connections to data sources and ensure real-time data integration for accurate recommendations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify data integration by comparing input data with expected outputs.

subtasks.title: Design UI for Recommendations Display
subtasks.description: Create a card-based UI to display recommendations.
subtasks.details: Design and implement a user interface that presents recommendations in a clear, card-based format.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct usability testing to ensure clarity and accessibility of the recommendations display.

tasks.title: Develop Anomaly Detection & Alerting System
tasks.description: Detect anomalies in marketplace metrics and alert operators.
tasks.details: Monitor key metrics for statistical outliers and significant changes. Deliver alerts via dashboard notifications and email.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate anomalies in test data and verify alert accuracy and timeliness.

tasks.title: Create Churn Prediction Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a dashboard to predict and display customer churn risk.
tasks.details: Use logistic regression for churn prediction. Display risk by customer segment and provide intervention recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate model predictions with historical churn data and assess prediction accuracy.

tasks.title: Integrate Real-Time Updates with SSE
tasks.description: Implement Server-Sent Events for real-time dashboard updates.
tasks.details: Use SSE to push real-time updates to the dashboard. Ensure efficient data flow and minimal latency.
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time updates with simulated data changes and measure update latency.

tasks.title: Set Up Authentication with NextAuth.js
tasks.description: Implement user authentication for the dashboard.
tasks.details: Use NextAuth.js to set up authentication. Configure providers and secure API routes.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify authentication flow with test users and ensure secure access to dashboard features.

tasks.title: Develop API Endpoints for Data Access
tasks.description: Create API routes for accessing marketplace data.
tasks.details: Implement RESTful API endpoints using Next.js API routes for accessing session, customer, and tutor data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints with various queries and validate response accuracy and performance.

tasks.title: Implement Redis Caching for Performance
tasks.description: Use Redis to cache frequently accessed data.
tasks.details: Set up Redis with a 15-minute TTL for caching. Optimize cache usage for high-demand data queries.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure performance improvements with caching enabled and verify cache hit rates.

tasks.title: Deploy Application on Vercel
tasks.description: Deploy the dashboard application to Vercel for production use.
tasks.details: Configure Vercel for deployment, ensuring environment variables are set for database and API access.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify deployment success by accessing the application on a public URL and testing core functionalities.

tasks.title: Set Up Email Alert System
tasks.description: Implement email notifications for critical alerts.
tasks.details: Use SendGrid to send email alerts for critical issues. Configure email templates and delivery settings.
tasks.testStrategy: Test email delivery with various alert scenarios and ensure timely receipt.

tasks.title: Create Tutor Performance Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a dashboard to track tutor performance metrics.
tasks.details: Display tutor performance data including success rates and average ratings. Highlight top and underperforming tutors.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate performance metrics with historical data and ensure accurate flagging of tutor performance.

tasks.title: Implement Alert History and Management
tasks.description: Develop a system to manage and view alert history.
tasks.details: Create a view for alert history with filtering options. Allow users to acknowledge and resolve alerts.
tasks.testStrategy: Test alert management features with simulated alerts and verify correct status updates.

tasks.title: Develop Export Functionality for Customer Data
tasks.description: Enable export of customer data to CSV format.
tasks.details: Implement a feature to export customer lists and details to CSV for offline analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Test export functionality with large datasets and verify data integrity in exported files.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design for Mobile
tasks.description: Ensure the dashboard is mobile-friendly with responsive design.
tasks.details: Use Tailwind CSS to implement responsive design principles. Test the dashboard on various screen sizes.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify layout and usability on mobile devices and adjust styles as necessary.

tasks.title: Set Up Monitoring and Logging with Sentry
tasks.description: Implement error monitoring and logging using Sentry.
tasks.details: Integrate Sentry for tracking errors and performance issues. Configure alerts for critical errors.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate errors in the application and verify Sentry captures and reports them accurately.

tasks.title: Optimize Database Queries for Performance
tasks.description: Improve database query performance for faster data access.
tasks.details: Analyze and optimize SQL queries to reduce latency. Use indexes and query caching where applicable.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure query performance before and after optimization and ensure significant improvements.

tasks.title: Implement User Feedback Mechanism
tasks.description: Develop a system for users to provide feedback on the dashboard.
tasks.details: Create a feedback form accessible from the dashboard. Store feedback in a dedicated database table for analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Test feedback submission and storage with various input scenarios.

tasks.title: Conduct Usability Testing
tasks.description: Perform usability testing to identify and resolve UX issues.
tasks.details: Conduct testing sessions with representative users to gather feedback on usability and design.
tasks.testStrategy: Analyze feedback and make necessary adjustments to improve user experience.

tasks.title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and guides for users and developers.
tasks.details: Document all features, API endpoints, and setup instructions. Create user guides for dashboard navigation and usage.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and clarity. Ensure guides are easy to follow and understand.
